project.name: JAGO Motion Technologies Website
project.description: A static website showcasing healthcare and disability products for enhanced mobility and independence. Features responsive design, interactive product galleries, accessibility, and brochure downloads.
project.framework: None (Static Site, Tailwind CSS for styling)

netlify.usage: Hosting, CDN, and deployment for static site

media_gallery.image_display: Static images in /images/ folders referenced by HTML pages
media_gallery.video_display: Static videos in /images/[Product]/ folders referenced by HTML pages

brochure_download.download_link: Brochure images or PDFs linked from product pages

testing.notes: Test responsiveness, gallery navigation, and accessibility manually.

ai_goals: Suggest UI/UX improvements for accessibility and responsiveness
Generate documentation for new features or pages
Propose SEO enhancements for static site

deployment.notes: No build step required. Drag-and-drop or git-based deploy to Netlify.

knowledge_map_description: Canonical, machine-readable map of all HTML pages, components, and static assets. AI agents and automation tools should consult this file first for code understanding, RAG, and advanced code search.
